Why did he leave?  Ah well, sad to see a rookie leave, but at least some ve=
terans like myself are still around.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=
: EmprzAnastazia@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, J=
une 05, 2003 12:34 PM
  Subject: Re: Conflict at the Ark


  In a message d=
ated 6/5/03 6:19:38 AM Central Daylight Time, cardhead649@... writes:=




    That's it - I'm gone.  I've had it.

    If I can't get any respect=
, I'll go somewhere that I'm appreciated.  
    Somewhere that gives a shit=
 that some of its members aren't complete 
    Internet junkies that have n=
othing better to do than hang around one 
    website all day.

    In shor=
t, somewhere a hell of a lot better than this piece of shit!  
    As of ri=
ght now, every character I've got has ceased to exist within 
    the confi=
nes of NBW.  Empath, Synergy, Wheeljack-X, Phoenix, 
    Pumpskin, Flicker =
(unless dewboy wants him back), Skyblaze, and the 
    Rogues are gone.  Va=
nished without a trace.  Forever.  And so am I!




  Would hate to see you=
 go. But if you must, then so be it. 

  I'd say more, but I won't. 

  Sta=
c 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Gro=
ups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
